GSD.description:
io-wq: check for wq exit after adding new worker task_work

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.11 by commit 4b4e5bbf9386d4ec21d91c0cb0fd60b9bba778ec. For more details please see the references link.
